title: cannot connect getting a issue after exiting a game due to a bug riot whats up with that ?
body:
Okay so lately I have been experiencing this bug where when I enter a game from time to time I cannot use any skills. Sometimes I have to exit the game and restart the match loading. Often I have to completely restart the game .... Why has this bug not been dealt with ? 

Now today I did this and now I am getting a cannot connect to server issue. for no reason.

replies.body:
It seems like your client is having a hard time making stable connections with our servers. Sometimes you get a good link with the game server and everything is fine, other times it's a little unstable and that's when you're not able to use your abilities. 

Check out the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can narrow down what's giving your network a hard time.
